description: Check result for a single release file on a target database.

advices.description: The list of advice for the file and the target.

affected_rows.description: The count of affected rows of the statement on the target.

file.description: The file path that is being checked.

risk_level.description: The risk level of the statement on the target.
risk_level.title: Risk Level

target.description:
The target that the check is performed on.
 Should be a database. Format: instances/{instance}/databases/{database}

title: Check Result
